mapper.sql: id, enterprise_id, parent_id, order_type, in_date, code, in_man_id, in_man_code, in_man_name, in_type, src_unit_type, src_unit_id, src_unit_code, src_unit_name, flow_code, quantity_total, varieties_quantity, amount_total, notax_amount_total, tax_amount_total, excessive_sale_codes, status, remark, creater_id, creater_code, creater_name, create_time, modifier_id, modifier_code, modifier_name, update_time
mapper.select:
SELECT shelf.id as id, shelf.enterprise_id as enterPriseId, detail.goods_id as goodsId, detail.goods_code AS goodsCode, detail.goods_name as goodsName, detail.barcode as barcode, detail.goods_generic_name AS goodsGenericName, detail.dosage_id as dosageId, detail.dosage_name as dosageName, detail.goods_specification AS goodsSpecification, detail.unit_id as unitId, detail.unit_name as unitName, detail.manufacturer_id AS manufacturerId, detail.manufacturer AS manufacturer, detail.goods_specification as goodsPlace, detail.approval_number as approvalNumber, shelf.shelf_id as shelfId, shelf.shelf_name as shelfName, /** * 税率带过去用进项税 */ business.purchase_tax_rate_id as taxRateId, business.purchase_tax_rate as taxRate, shelf.lot_number as lotNumber, shelf.lot_id as lotId, shelf.product_date as productDate, shelf.valid_date as validDate, shelf.unit_price as unitPrice, shelf.quantity as quantity, stock.usable_quantity as usableQuantity, storage.near_effect_period AS nearEffectPeriod, storage.near_effect_period_unit AS nearEffectPeriodUnit
from saas_sale_shelf shelf ,saas_sale_detail detail,saas_sale sale,saas_stock stock,saas_goods goods,saas_goods_business business, saas_goods_storage storage
where shelf.sale_dtl_id = detail.id AND shelf.sale_id = sale.id AND stock.enterprise_id = shelf.enterprise_id AND shelf.goods_id = stock.goods_id AND shelf.lot_id = stock.lot_id
AND shelf.shelf_id = stock.shelf_id AND goods.id = detail.goods_id AND goods.id = storage.goods_id AND goods.id = business.goods_id AND shelf.enterprise_id = #{enterpriseId} AND goods.status = '1' AND goods.valid_flag = '1' /** 超量销售状态为 1 且是销售状态 0 */ AND sale.excessive_sale = 1 AND sale.sale_type = 0
mapper.insert: insert into saas_other_in (id, enterprise_id, parent_id, order_type, in_date, code, in_man_id, in_man_code, in_man_name, in_type, src_unit_type, src_unit_id, src_unit_code, src_unit_name, flow_code, quantity_total, varieties_quantity, amount_total, notax_amount_total, tax_amount_total, excessive_sale_codes, status, remark, creater_id, creater_code, creater_name, create_time, modifier_id, modifier_code, modifier_name, update_time ) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{enterpriseId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{parentId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{orderType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{inDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{inManId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{inManCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{inManName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{inType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{srcUnitType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{srcUnitId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{srcUnitCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{srcUnitName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{flowCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{quantityTotal,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{varietiesQuantity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{amountTotal,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{notaxAmountTotal,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{taxAmountTotal,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{excessiveSaleCodes,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createrId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createrCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createrName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifierId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{modifierCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifierName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )

update saas_other_in
enterprise_id = #{enterpriseId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
order_type = #{orderType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
in_date = #{inDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
in_man_id = #{inManId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
in_man_code = #{inManCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
in_man_name = #{inManName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
in_type = #{inType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
src_unit_type = #{srcUnitType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
src_unit_id = #{srcUnitId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
src_unit_code = #{srcUnitCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
src_unit_name = #{srcUnitName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
flow_code = #{flowCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
quantity_total = #{quantityTotal,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
varieties_quantity = #{varietiesQuantity,jdbcType=INTEGER},
amount_total = #{amountTotal,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
notax_amount_total = #{notaxAmountTotal,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
tax_amount_total = #{taxAmountTotal,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
excessive_sale_codes = #{excessiveSaleCodes,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
creater_id = #{createrId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
creater_code = #{createrCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
creater_name = #{createrName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
modifier_id = #{modifierId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
modifier_code = #{modifierCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
modifier_name = #{modifierName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update saas_other_in set enterprise_id = #{enterpriseId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, order_type = #{orderType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, in_date = #{inDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, in_man_id = #{inManId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, in_man_code = #{inManCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, in_man_name = #{inManName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, in_type = #{inType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, src_unit_type = #{srcUnitType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, src_unit_id = #{srcUnitId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, src_unit_code = #{srcUnitCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, src_unit_name = #{srcUnitName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, flow_code = #{flowCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, quantity_total = #{quantityTotal,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, varieties_quantity = #{varietiesQuantity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, amount_total = #{amountTotal,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, notax_amount_total = #{notaxAmountTotal,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, tax_amount_total = #{taxAmountTotal,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, excessive_sale_codes = #{excessiveSaleCodes,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, creater_id = #{createrId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, creater_code = #{createrCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, creater_name = #{createrName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modifier_id = #{modifierId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, modifier_code = #{modifierCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, modifier_name = #{modifierName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
